title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Statistical Meaning-Making and Expert Critical Thinking Comparison: Discussion-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistics knowledge and understanding of scientific research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can construct argumentative structures to critically assess statistical results in various contexts.
Learners can comparatively analyze differences in statistical interpretations between expert and student groups.
Learners can argue the validity of statistical decision-making using virtual data in a VR simulation environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
